name: First Person Shooter (KurokiYurei, Pausan300)
description:
Simple FPS game created with Unity Engine as an assignment for the 3D Video Game Development subject of Tecnocampus University.

The goal is to complete the different challenges to unlock doors and advance through the levels.

Controls
WASD to move around
R to reload
Shift to sprint
E to interact
Mouse to aim
Mouse Left-Click to shoot

Disclaimer
We do not own any of the visual assets from the game.

Created by Pau Sánchez Cairó and Josep Franqueza Martí
